limited-friend-list:
Your friend list is full!
Please disconnect from friends you don't contact to add new ones
delete-friend-message:
If you delete a friend,
the conversation will also be deleted!
delete-friend-sub-message:
If you just disconnect,
the conversation history will be preserved.
delete-friend-sub-message2:
You won't be able to chat again until
you receive an invitation or invite them.
empty-friend-list: You don't have any friends yet
